copy.dropAdventureLeader: Do you want to cancel the group you are currently leading?
copy.dropAdventure: Do you want to leave the group you are currently in?
copy.joinRejected: Sorry, this group is already full.
copy.triggerRejected: Oops, there seems to be a problem loading this adventure, please try again later.
copy.modeTitle: What do you want to do?
copy.storyPanelBody: You need to be Talent Level 3 to enter the Wilderness.
copy.waiting: Asking to join an adventure group led by
copy.rejected: is waiting to adventure with a different player.
copy.noSpellsHeader: You're almost ready to enter the Wilderness!
copy.noSpells1: You need to learn your first Talent Skill before you enter the Wilderness. Go see Fawn at Fawn's Hideout in Maple Tree Hill and complete your "Learn to Charm" quest!
copy.noSpells2: You need to learn your first Talent Skill before you enter the Wilderness. Go see Rosetta at Rosetta's Garden in Cherryblossom Heights and complete your "Learn to Grow" quest!
copy.noSpells3: You need to learn your first Talent Skill before you enter the Wilderness. Go see Iridessa at Iridessa's Glade in Sunflower Gully and complete your "Learn to Illuminate" quest!
copy.noSpells4: You need to learn your first Talent Skill before you enter the Wilderness. Go see Silvermist at Sivermist's Grotto in Dewdrop Vale and complete your "Learn to Splash" quest!
copy.noSpells5: You need to learn your first Talent Skill before you enter the Wilderness. Go see Tinker Bell at Tinker's Nook in Cottonpuff Field and complete your "Learn to Fix" quest!
copy.noCookiesBody: Visit Dulcie's Kitchen in Neverberry Thicket and use Personal Baking to fill your pouch with pixie-dust-filled cookies! You'll need them to refill your supply of pixie dust and complete all the challenges in the Wilderness!
copy.noWelcomeQuestHeader: Are you ready to enter the Wilderness?
copy.noWelcomeQuestBody: The first step is to go see Tinker Bell and complete your "Welcome to Pixie Hollow" quest. You can find her at Tinker's Nook in Cottonpuff Field!
